amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for IRS enforcement by $2 million and increases funding for third-party testing burden relief at CPSC by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for IRS enforcement by $2 million and to increase funding for CPSC salaries and expenses by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
